author: Nwachukwu Nnabugwu
comment: This application has never worked correctly ever since I installed it. The LiveTv feature has never worked for once. It's only showing channel 100, nothing else. How do I get this issue sorted out?  I wish I can attach screenshots so you understand better. This application needs total overhaul. What's the essence of the app when the end user 👤 can't use it conveniently?

reply.author: MultiChoice Support Services (Pty) Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Nwachukwu,
It sounds like your smartcard is not linked to your ConnectID. Please contact us directly on Live Chat or via email on dstvnow@support.dstv.com, with your ConnectID, so that we can assist.

author: Elikan Mwape
comment: It keeps losing contents and every time it happens I have to contact the help  desk. Even the logout and login again is not working as an option to resolve the issue. After you logout, the app fails to connect to the internet even when Wi-Fi or Mobile data is on. Quite frustrasting.

reply.author: MultiChoice Support Services (Pty) Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Elikan,
Sorry to hear you are experiencing this issue. Please could you try to uninstall and reinstall the app and let us know if that resolves the issue?

reply.content:
Hi Heinricht,

author: Godfrey Musango
comment: Started out ok. Used for a while till it started acting up. Tells me I can't use it anymore coz my phone is not certified? I have a Samsung Galaxy C9 Pro. However when I check list of certified phones provided, Samsung is one of them. So I wonder if it's the particular phone or the app is faulty. And why was I able to use it initially on the same phone..

reply.author: MultiChoice Support Services (Pty) Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Godfrey,
For legal reasons, the DStv Now app is no longer available on uncertified Google devices. Please ensure that you are using a Google-certified device by going to Google Play Store menu == Settings==Device certifications

author: Travis Buckle
comment: The servers must be made of patatoe or something because it's always freezing up and often doesn't even start to stream. I use other streaming services . E.g. Sky Sports, Netflix Etc. And never have this problem.

reply.author: MultiChoice Support Services (Pty) Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Travis,
We are aware of some issues with streaming, and are actively working on this. To assist us with our troubleshooting, could you possibly advise which channels you are experiencing problems on, as well as what happens when the app doesn't start the stream?

author: Andre van Jaarsveldt
comment: This App improved greatly the past year. Only reason now I'm giving it an 3 star and not 5 star is the "only 4 devices that can be registered". Netflix offer unlimited devices and 2 views at one time. Please increase that number. Thanks!

reply.author: MultiChoice Support Services (Pty) Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Andre,
Thank you for your feedback. We are actively working on improving the app. Unfortunately at this stage our content rights prevent us from increasing the number of registered devices, but we are working at renegotiating our contracts to improve the service we give our customers.

comment: I want to suggest your team adds a more reduced video quality option(say120-150mb/hour) for us (Nigerians). Many would have loved to always make use of the app. But data bundles are damn expensive. Thanks.

reply.author: MultiChoice Support Services (Pty) Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Olawale,
Thank you for your feedback! We are looking at improving the video quality options.

author: Lizette Myburgh
comment: My husband is in the USA. He is on wifi. In SA he's live TV and catch-up worked. Now in the USA it does not want to work. Please assist. Says video playback is not available.

reply.author: MultiChoice Support Services (Pty) Ltd
reply.content:
Hi Lizette,
DStv Now content is only available in DStv territories across Africa. Unfortunately, unless your husband downloaded some Catch Up to watch while he was out of South Africa, he will not be able to watch in the USA. This is as a result of content rights restrictions.
